name: Down Ball Jump
description:
Try to go down as far as you can.
Tap to jump the ball, avoid spikes. Tap twice to jump the ball higher and further.
collect white tiles to earn points.
Jump the ball at the right moment to weave your way down the paths.
How far down can you go?

Features
-one tap game play
-UnLock characters
-Compete on the leaderboard
